bibl.title: Regaling Officials in Ptolemaic Egypt. A Dramatic Reading of Official Accounts from the Menches Papers. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXXII.)
bibl.note: (Re-)publication and new interpretation of five accounts from the second century BCE Menches papers: P. Tebt. I, 112 [= P. Tebt. 1151]; 185 descr. [= 1152]; 213 descr. [= 1153]; 113 [= 1154]; 212 descr. [= 1155]. - Introduction: 1. The texts; - 2. Purpose of the accounts; - 3. Method of accounting; - 4. Silver versus bronze; - 5. Inpayments; - 6. Outpayments to individuals; - 7. The reception of officials; - 8. Other outpayments. - Texts [Nos 1-5]. - Appendices: I. Accounting terms; - II. Officials and payments of wheat; - III. Index of prices and payments. - Select Bibliography. Indices.
